short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save multiple Gmail emails as text-based PDFs with one click. Images included. No need to grant access to your entire Gmail account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save one or multiple Gmails as text-based, high-quality PDFs in just one click. Designed with efficiency and privacy in mind, 

'Email to PDF' ensures all your email contents, including text and images, are preserved perfectly without needing to log in or grant access to your entire Gmail account.
